item.title: Fini les factures exorbitantes : ce forfait à 7,99 €/mois s’adapte à VOS besoins [Sponso]

item.title: La toute première sonnette connectée Philips Hue, avec son carillon, est déjà en promo à -30 %
item.description: Nouvelle arrivée dans la gamme Philips Hue, la sonnette connectée Secure Video Doorbell est actuellement proposée, avec son carillon, à 139,99 euros au lieu de 199,99 euros chez Boulanger.

item.title: I've spent 20 years testing hi-fi and these bookshelf speakers are the gateway drug to passive perfection
item.description: After chasing the pricier loudspeaker dollar, Dali has returned to its roots with the super-affordable Kupid. Is the company’s entry-level mojo still working?

item.title: Empathy and reasoning aren’t rivals, research shows
item.description: Our findings suggest that the most powerful approach may be to pair empathy’s motivation with reasoning’s direction. For years, philosophers and psychologists have debated whether empathy helps or hinders the ways people decide how to help others. Critics of empathy argue that it makes people care too narrowly—focusing on individual stories rather than the broader needs of society—while careful reasoning enables more impartial, evidence-based choices....

item.title: Octopath Traveler 0 is a hefty investment that rewards your patience
item.description: 'Octopath Traveler 0' overcomes humble beginnings to become one of the best RPGs of the year.

item.description: Stocking stuffers might be small in size but they don't have to be cheap and crappy. Here are 60+ of our favorite small gift ideas for Christmas stockings.

item.title: What does the Netflix and Warner Bros. deal mean for you? Here's what experts predict about price hikes
item.description: Netflix has just announced the biggest entertainment shake-up for years with its $72 billion deal to buy Warner Bros. Discovery. But what does this mean for you?

item.title: How fit are you? 3 simple tests to evaluate your strength, endurance, and cardiovascular fitness
item.description: Seem like an odd topic for small business owners? Not at all: research shows fitness is a key factor for intelligence, stress release, and mood. Most entrepreneurs are familiar with diminishing returns: how, when other variables stay constant, at some point putting in additional time and effort results in increasingly smaller results. Since resources are always limited, figuring out where to spend your entrepreneurial time so it delivers the best bang per hour is critical....

item.title: Whatnot’s CEO on the rise of live shopping.
item.description: Whatnot’s cofounder and CEO Grant LaFontaine explains how his team has managed to evoke the feel of in-person shopping inside an online experience. While digital live shopping has been popular for years in Asia, the phenomenon has only recently begun to take off in the U.S., thanks in large part to the rise of retail disruptor Whatnot. The platform’s cofounder and CEO, Grant LaFontaine, shares how his team has managed to evoke the feel of in-person shopping inside an online experience, and how Whatnot’s breakthrough is influencing other retailers and brands. LaFontaine also digs into the start...

item.title: 15 tech gifts that older people will actually use
item.description: Tech gifts that older people receive often go unused. But there are gadgets that would make their lives better, and in some cases, yours, too. Ask friends what kind of tech gift you should get for your parent, grandparent, or another older person in your life, and chances are you’ll get the same generic suggestions, like a digital picture frame or a portable Bluetooth speaker. But these gifts will almost certainly remain little used throughout the year. (I mean, how many digital picture frames would you like?) ...

item.description: We tested both the Bose QuietComfort Ultra (Gen 2) and the Sony WH-1000xM6 headphones to see which ones come out on top.

item.title: Webb telescope found a Milky Way lookalike 12 billion light-years away
item.description: Using NASA's James Webb Space Telescope, scientists have found a grand design spiral galaxy like the Milky Way in the early universe.

item.title: Vers un futur « Starlink Mobile » pour court-circuiter les opérateurs ?
item.description: Après avoir proposé une connexion par satellite aux opérateurs du monde entier, la filiale de SpaceX semble préparer une offensive directe auprès du grand public avec le dépôt de la marque « Starlink Mobile ».
